articles.author: Yong Jian
articles.title: Huawei’s Mate70 to flex high-end chip self-sufficiency - Asia Times
articles.description: Huawei will launch Mate70 flagship smartphone on November 26 to show its ability of making smartphones without using US chips and software.
articles.content:
China’s Huawei Technologies is set to launch its Mate70 flagship smartphone on November 26, a milestone in its sanctions-induced quest for self-sufficiency from US chips and software.
Richard Yu, ch… [+4752 chars]
